PHOTO_SOURCING_GUIDE.overview: This file shows all products that need professional images

image_requirements.background: Clean white or light gray backgrounds
image_requirements.sizing: All images must be exactly the same dimensions

PRODUCTS_NEEDING_IMAGES.CRITICAL_NOTE: ALL IMAGES MUST BE PRODUCT-SPECIFIC, NOT GENERIC STOCK PHOTOS

SPECIFIC_REQUIREMENTS.show_actual_cards: Real business card layouts with text/logos, not blank cards
SPECIFIC_REQUIREMENTS.paper_finishes: Different paper stocks - matte, glossy, textured visible
SPECIFIC_REQUIREMENTS.special_effects: Show foil, embossing, spot UV, rounded corners
SPECIFIC_REQUIREMENTS.context: Professional business setting or clean product shots

variants_must_show.Luxury: Foil, embossing, or premium paper effects

SPECIFIC_REQUIREMENTS.show_displayed: Banners HANGING or DISPLAYED, not flat artwork

variants_must_show.Vinyl: Glossy outdoor banner hanging with grommets
variants_must_show.Fabric: Soft fabric banner at indoor event
variants_must_show.Retractable: Pull-up banner stand at trade show/event

SPECIFIC_REQUIREMENTS.show_installed: Signs IN REAL OUTDOOR SETTINGS with stakes in ground
SPECIFIC_REQUIREMENTS.real_context: Front yards, construction sites, events, roadsides
SPECIFIC_REQUIREMENTS.material_visible: Show corrugated plastic texture and thickness
SPECIFIC_REQUIREMENTS.installation: Stakes, wire frames, mounting hardware visible

variants_must_show.Standard: Basic corrugated yard sign with H-stakes in yard
variants_must_show.Premium: Thicker material with professional frame stakes
variants_must_show.Double-sided: Sign showing both sides, professional installation

SPECIFIC_REQUIREMENTS.show_mechanism: ACTUAL RETRACTABLE STAND with banner pulled up
SPECIFIC_REQUIREMENTS.real_context: Trade shows, lobbies, retail stores, events
SPECIFIC_REQUIREMENTS.hardware_visible: Show base, pole, and retraction mechanism

variants_must_show.Economy: Basic retractable stand with simple base
variants_must_show.Deluxe: Top-tier stand with advanced features/wider base

WORKFLOW_FOR_PHOTO_TEAM.step_1: Review data/products.json for complete product list
WORKFLOW_FOR_PHOTO_TEAM.step_3: Create/source images for each variant - SQUARE FORMAT ONLY (1200x1200px)
WORKFLOW_FOR_PHOTO_TEAM.step_4: Ensure ALL images are exactly the same dimensions
WORKFLOW_FOR_PHOTO_TEAM.step_5: Name files to match variant names exactly
WORKFLOW_FOR_PHOTO_TEAM.step_6: Update image URLs in CSV files
WORKFLOW_FOR_PHOTO_TEAM.step_8: Verify images load correctly and are consistent in size

style_guidelines.background: Clean white or light gray backgrounds
style_guidelines.lighting: Professional, even lighting - no harsh shadows
style_guidelines.angle: Slight 3/4 view for dimensional products, straight-on for flat items
style_guidelines.composition: Product centered, adequate white space around edges
style_guidelines.consistency: Identical dimensions, similar lighting and background across ALL products
style_guidelines.resolution: High-res for web use, optimized file sizes

CONTACT_INFO.questions: Ask developer about specific product requirements
CONTACT_INFO.testing: Always test images by running build script
CONTACT_INFO.priority: Focus on business-cards, banners, yard-signs first
CONTACT_INFO.style_reference: Check vistaprint.com and uprinting.com for professional examples
